name: Mental Friends
description:
Description:

Mental Friends is a 2D platformer game that was made for the 1st Annual May Day Mental Health Game Jam. 

In the game you go through the world with your new friend "Pinkie", helping him find his lost spaceship all the while he tells you his tips for better mental health!

                                                                           

Team:

Johan
